headline: SLB: Jefferies' forecasts for Q2
summary: Jefferies confirms its buy rating on Schlumberger shares with an unchanged target price of $53.Jefferies expects EBITDA of $2.02bn in Q2 2025, stable compared to the previous quarter and in line with...
